name: Covert Psychological Self-Defense
description: Subtle but effective strategies to resist and counteract psychological manipulation without direct confrontation.

cards.title: Stealth Resistance to Psychological Control
cards.description: Remaining outwardly compliant while internally rejecting manipulative influence.
bulletpoints: Using passive resistance strategies to neutralize persuasion tactics.
Feigning compliance while subverting control attempts from within.
Practicing controlled disengagement to avoid psychological entrapment.

cards.title: Silent Boundary Enforcement
cards.description: Setting psychological boundaries without verbal confrontation.
bulletpoints: Using body language and microexpressions to establish dominance.
Controlling space and positioning to weaken manipulative pressure.
Practicing nonverbal defiance to resist covert control mechanisms.

cards.title: Camouflaged Psychological Resistance
cards.description: Using strategic deception to make manipulative individuals underestimate you.
bulletpoints: Feigning emotional vulnerability to extract information while maintaining internal resilience.
Using controlled unpredictability to confuse and derail psychological attacks.
Deploying selective disengagement to make manipulation attempts ineffective.
